alert.note: Alert for Kossuth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:03PM CDT until August 11 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Kossuth County in north central Iowa... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 803 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Swea City, or 17 miles north of Algona, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Union Slogh, Bancroft, and Swea City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
